title: Permanently banned, not here to debate though, just showing chat logs cause sadness (I'm guilty)
body:
**Update: Some images, more if requested
https://imgur.com/a/wbrS86W**

*Update: Just saw a second tab from a game before this one. I got banned right after Game 1. In Game 2 however, just some minor backstory, Aatrox and I were friends and in pre-made call together, and all the ping-spamming he did to me was mutual, we jokingly "harassed" each other. We also played two other games together after that one. The Graves however, was not with us, and he probably reported me.*

Hi guys,

I've just been banned from a heated game that... didn't actually even matter. A pre-made screwed me over by not banning 2 slots, flamed me pre-, in- and post-game throughout the whole game, and I got upset and typed too much..
Kinda sad caused first time I ever made Gold, but oh well, at least want to tell others to make myself feel less bad... 

I have screenshots of pre- and post-game lobby if you're interested in what team "mates" said.

Also, at some points when I say stuff like "what a legend," it was in response to his mocking (Brand: 60 CS at 15 minutes, what a legend), not that toxic on my own. I'm still guilty though, evidently.

The Brand also added me afterwards to try to trash talk me, and right then I got a notification that I got banned, and he messaged me some rude stuff and unadded me...

Anyway, here are my chat logs:

Game 1
Pre-Game
ˆˇˉˇˆ: WTF
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Why did yoiu ban Nothing????
ˆˇˉˇˆ: You coulda banned Yasuo!
ˆˇˉˇˆ: ...what the fuck
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Yes?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: No
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Not scared, frustrated
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I Hate playing against Yasuo, Lucian, Brand, and Jhin
ˆˇˉˇˆ: ?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I'm not saying I will lose, I'm saying I don't have FUN playing against those
In-Game
ˆˇˉˇˆ: What
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Stop
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Please
ˆˇˉˇˆ: lag btw
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Brand wtf man
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I literally saw you walk towards bot so I start engaging cause I think IOm safe since youre coming
ˆˇˉˇˆ: And you walk BACK into their jungle????
ˆˇˉˇˆ: They're tucking killing us
ˆˇˉˇˆ: AND they got Drake
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I literally piinged drake
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Then COME with me
ˆˇˉˇˆ: You leave for no reason
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Brand roams when I think he will engage
ˆˇˉˇˆ: And I die
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Without even PINGING where he's going
ˆˇˉˇˆ: ?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Literally what else am I supposed to do
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Cant even stay under tower
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Cause Ali WQ combos me and Lucian has Bork
ˆˇˉˇˆ: At least grant us a gank please
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Since Brand doesnt help at all
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Lucian will carry them guys
ˆˇˉˇˆ: If you dont help bot soon
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Olaf
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Wanna switch lanes
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Thanks
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Brand is roaming 24/7 and blames me for dying in lane
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Thanks team, didnt I say Lucian is fed?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: But yes, keep blaming me instead of helping me like I ask the whole game, that'll help
ˆˇˉˇˆ: aka VAYNE and BRAND
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Zero lane presence at 15 minutes
ˆˇˉˇˆ: What a legend
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Zero support role presence at 15 minutes
ˆˇˉˇˆ: How do you do it?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Then tell your duo Brand to stop talking
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Nice toxic question mark ping, Brand
ˆˇˉˇˆ: That'll SURE help us win!!!!
ˆˇˉˇˆ: True
ˆˇˉˇˆ: why say no
ˆˇˉˇˆ: See, Brand always walks away then flames me for my low CS
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Are you flaming me Olaf
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Why
ˆˇˉˇˆ: How would I do any damage with my current items
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Youre 1/5, even worse than we
ˆˇˉˇˆ: *me
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Farmed? 1v2?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Farm 1v2?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: vs ali and lucian who flash engage me?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I didnt have any ganks either AND I was 1v2 in lane
ˆˇˉˇˆ: But please, continue flaming me Olaf
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Unless youre duo with the support
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Ah, youre duo, that explains your toxicity
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Thanks Vayne
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Questio mark?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Tell your duo to not roam lane anymore then
Post-Game
ˆˇˉˇˆ: LMAO TEAM BLAMES ME EVEN THOUGH I SAID BAN LUCIAN AND TWO OF THEM DIDNT BAN ANYTHING
ˆˇˉˇˆ: But continue flaming me
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I said ban Lucian, you didn't
ˆˇˉˇˆ: You said you didn't need to LMAO
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Clearly you can't even carry
ˆˇˉˇˆ: k then dont flame me cause youre trash also as it seems
ˆˇˉˇˆ: If you dont ban anyone and still cant carry lmao
ˆˇˉˇˆ: mmmmhm
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Keep tellin yourself that
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I said Lucian
ˆˇˉˇˆ: WHo cares about Morg
ˆˇˉˇˆ: idgaf about Morg
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I said Lucian
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Then be quiet lmao?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: You lost against a Lucian
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Nope, you are


Game 2
Pre-Game
ˆˇˉˇˆ: inb4 enemy picks yasuo
ˆˇˉˇˆ: gang gang (inside joke plz no flame, I know this looks embarrassing)
In-Game
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Watch for tribush ganks
ˆˇˉˇˆ: was oom
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Graves
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Can
ˆˇˉˇˆ: You
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Fuckin
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Do
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Dragon
ˆˇˉˇˆ: They will literally take AND I P{INGED IT ALL GAME LONG
ˆˇˉˇˆ: for FUCKS SAKE
ˆˇˉˇˆ: com,e bot
ˆˇˉˇˆ: drake up soon
ˆˇˉˇˆ: EXACTLTY
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Those hooks are BS
ˆˇˉˇˆ: I literally said everyone go bot
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Even if we lose mid tower
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Dude
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Red drake > mid tower
ˆˇˉˇˆ: It was a SECOND mid tower
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Aatrox you are the one that didnt come drake
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Youre ESPECIALLY useless
ˆˇˉˇˆ: At least Graves and I tried to do drag
ˆˇˉˇˆ: You just stay top jerkin the enemy Urgot lmao
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Dont even talk Aatrox, youre pathetic
ˆˇˉˇˆ: ...and THIS is you dont fuckin stay mid, Zed
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Hey Aatrox
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Start bein useful
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Before nyou run your mouth
ˆˇˉˇˆ: lmao
ˆˇˉˇˆ: How about you start doin objectives gang gang? (again, inside joke, I really want to delete this part but I don't wanna edit my logs)
ˆˇˉˇˆ: HOW did that hook hit Graves
ˆˇˉˇˆ: That Thresh skin so misleading
ˆˇˉˇˆ: wanna keep doin that? i have all the time in the world
ˆˇˉˇˆ: OR we could stop pinging each other randomly and try to win
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Your choice Aatrox
ˆˇˉˇˆ: ok then, Aatrox likes pingiing his teammates I guess
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Our Aatrox has some sort of teammate pinging fetish idk what it is
ˆˇˉˇˆ: Enjoyin yourself honey?
ˆˇˉˇˆ: tell ,e more <3
Post-Game
ˆˇˉˇˆ: talk too much (also a joke, not inside, just regular, cause of the frequent "talk too much" memes

replies.body:
You got perma banned for that one game only? I see nothing there worth even a chat restriction. I did much worse when I was intentionally trying to get banned but I didn't receive so much as a chat restriction.
Weird. Anyway, it's a blessing in disguise. Now you can hopefully get over this toxic addiction of yours.

> [{quoted}](name=hotarse,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1ELJrIa6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-12-21T06:04:44.075+0000)
>
> You got perma banned for that one game only? I see nothing there worth even a chat restriction. I did much worse when I was intentionally trying to get banned but I didn't receive so much as a chat restriction.
> Weird. Anyway, it's a blessing in disguise. Now you can hopefully get over this toxic addiction of yours.

Exactly my opinion. I don't even see a point for a chat restriction.
Wait. WAIT!

I've said this before. The quickest way to get banned is to chat a lot, it doesn't matter really what you say, if you're vocal and point out what is going on you will be banned. 

Ex: Brand is 0-6 at 5 minutes, more than one death a minute and you say " stop feeding brand " that is somehow madly offensive and worth a ban, you know... over the guy who is doing obviously nothing to avoid dying. aka inting.

Hi, I already replied to another person, but apparently there is another tab with a second game.

However, this is the game that got me banned, which I disagree with, but can't really argue cause I *was* passive-aggressive and typed too much to play.

I'll update the post in a bit with explanation for that one.

DON'T blame yourself.
It's not you.

LoL is the equivalent to an abusive relationship.
First thing to note from abusive relationship is that the victim will always be placed in a position where they feel at fault.
This is never the case.

Riots system is designed to be abusive.

all the more juice for when they fall.
You're right. 100%. However, I have no friends, and nothing else to play as far as I know, so League is pretty much my only tool of escape..

Meh, idk... it's not really an "addiction," my toxicity has VASTLY improved over the years, but stuff like this just gets me heated y'know?

I even tried to disable chat, but I constantly find myself re-enabling chat cause I simply cannot stand not being able to know what is being said, no matter how little important it is.

Pre-mades that flame me and report me as a group are my weak spot, so to say. That frequently gets me typing like this...

do yourself a favour and escape this cancerous cesspit.
I have.
Now all I do is come to the forums to laugh at the inbred children and their stupid as fuck views on game design (which they have none of any worth 99% of the time) 

dude, the game is dead.
it's been devoured by Tencent.
If you stick around you will only be treated like a cash machine.

Just look at Blizzard Activision.
SAME DAMN THING.
Yeah... you're completely right. I've stopped spending money also. I wish I could just permanently be chat-restricted....
personally... I would rather go though chemotherapy than play another second of this game.

Hey, can't deny that haha

Hate how uncaring the company has become

I think you shouldn't try to control other players ban preferences. It's annoying to have a guy tell me word per word how to play the game. Advice is cool, I'll generally listen to someone who says "You might buy some mr, like x item" over someone who says "you buy x item or we lose because..." the lucian thing doesn't make sense. You get one ban pick, don't try to tell others who to ban. This isn't an attack on you. I'm just offering some pointers I had to learn too.

Yeah nah I get that, but after I asked why the banned nothing, his premade also banned nothing and made a rude remark telling me that they apparently don't need that.

And THEN they flame me all game for doing badly against a Lucian, when I warned them in pre-game?

Like, if you're gonna be rude like that in champ select, at least have the decency to respect me being tilted enough already having the enemy be a Lucian. 

Banning absolutely nothing just causes a major hindrance to your teammates. Sure, YOU may not "need" that ban, but don't fucking flame me when you see me do badly after having been warned of that.
All I see is what you type so filling in that extra part is helpful to draw better conclusions.
I added two pre-game screenshots I had

This isn't even bad... What?

RIP

I will forever remember you as... "Gang Gang".
plz don't ;-;
TOO LATE!
I don't like you very much {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Everything will be alright... Gang Gang...
Please don't mock my failure :(
But... I can't pronounce your name :(
Just read it as it's written

Up-Down-Minus-Down-Up...

I feel like the previous name was easier...
You know what, fine. It's the last of me you'll see anyway ;-;
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I ain't got much left on Boards when I can't even play :(

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/off-topic-en/uifN7jtJ-perma-ban Had the same problem my dude, riot doesn't address the people who cause the bad game but only the players who point out the facts. and from Gold 5 to P1 not one of the inters i encountered got a ban. (More like i had an ult to play with friends.) Even with proof of the match and tickets sent support not 1 person got ban, but if you point out their trolling's and ask for a report its free 10 game chat restriction.
Damn it's sad you got a perma for this, were you suspended before? It's quite rash because i got a 14 days ban for worse stuff
I had a 14-day suspension in February
Did I fart? What's that supposed to mean?
How is that relevant to this post?
wont be relevant in the slightest, don't know if you noticed, but there is a fair few scumbags on this forum that do nothing but look for fights.
Ah, correct. This community is so divided man... either you have completely fair, nice people, or pure dicks whose negative energy rubs off on you (no pun intended).

The majority of nice people have already left...
there are still people like me, who likes to consider myself as somewhere in between.
Im a nice person, but i wont BS you.
even if it hurts snowflakes in the feels.
I don't get it . How did you get banned from this ?can someone explain

Oh, I just realized there is a second game tab, which itself is kinda an odd one out, I'll explain in main post and post chat log for that also!

This is just the one that got be banned just now

This is sad.
All because the system detected a lot of profanity. :I
Yeah true, but I gotta admit that even though those games were doomed from the start based on the attitudes of my teammates, I wasn't really helping with my personal input...

> [{quoted}](name=ˆˇˉˇˆ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1ELJrIa6,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2018-12-21T23:13:57.351+0000)
>
> Yeah true, but I gotta admit that even though those games were doomed from the start based on the attitudes of my teammates, I wasn't really helping with my personal input...

True that. I had a match with 4 premades on my team, banned my chat, played Shen, muted them and focused on my own game of toying with my laner and split pushing all the time.
Did I ult them? Nope, my splitpushinf was more valuable than those toxic assholes.

I saw a comment of you saying you had a 2 week in Feb, so out of curiousity how often have you played since then? If you took a break between then and recently, or played only a few games since, you'd still have been on very thin ice as it can take a LOT of games to get off it.

If you've been playing frequently, I'd recommend sending in a support ticket if you haven't already. As both these logs are toxic, but should have only warrented a chat restriction.

In the first game you're clearly mad at Brand, and then you call out scores. In the second game, you're very clearly mad at both Graves and Aatrox, you proceeded to call Aatrox useless and pathetic, and you got mad at your teams in both games for them not doing what you wanted them to do.

Keep in mind, I am aware your post says that Aatrox is your premade, but you're putting toxic chat where everyone can see it. When wanting to joke around like that with friends, use the pm system, Discord, or whatever voice chat program you prefer.

But again, by the looks of it this should only have been a chat restriction depending on how often you've played since your 2 week, so if you've been playing often, again, send in a support ticket.
I've played at least 100 games since then, I'm sure. Do you think that's enough to warrant me down to a chat restriction?

> [{quoted}](name=ˆˇˉˇˆ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1ELJrIa6,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-12-21T23:08:05.578+0000)
>
> I've played at least 100 games since then, I'm sure. Do you think that's enough to warrant me down to a chat restriction?

Hm.. I want to say no, but it also depends on your attitude so I could be wrong, as it's most likely different for everyone. I highly recommend putting in a Support Ticket at this point though, or try for their Live Chat when it's open. They can help more than we can honestly.
Yup, tried Live Chat yesterday. Told me not enough games to get down a tier.

You have to play roughly 250 games to drop a tier, for some odd reason Winning games drops it faster than losing games, bot games don't counter, only PvP.

There are a bunch of triggers (more like trigger warnings) that can cost you points towards that, such as typing too much, any use of profanity etc, a lot of these triggers (or rules) will mark a game to give less points towards tier drop.

These Triggers only happen if someone reports, problem being ANYONE can report and it will make a trigger happen, no one report is less than anothers (although spamming reports every game will cause the game to treat your reports as null into X amount of games are played) this means reports from enemy teams will trigger reviews on TEAM CHAT only, even though the report was from someone who didn't see your chat.

This is also why NO ONE should report for someone else, you could be crippling your own report history to someone vague saying of toxicity, if you don't see it yourself, don't report.
Did you intentionally feed? No. You don't deserve the ban.
I didn't, and I don't. You're probably right, but... sadly Riot doesn't care about rational thinking...

Question,

Why is the "none" option in banning phase still a thing.I have seen many arguments coming from that BS in my games.I see nothing wrong in these chat logs for your ban to be justified.

Maybe you went out of your way in any past games mate?

Nah, not really. I said stuff like "ward bush PLZ WARD BUSH," but that's about it. These are my worst ones.

But yeah, banning none option is fucking backwards-ass minded.
